article.title: Galaxy India Community
article.tease: Working data-intensive science in India? Please join us.
article.content:
We are very pleased to announce that the Galaxy India community has started! Galaxy India had a soft launch during GCC2021. We are planning a full community launch at InBix 2021, during two days of pre-conference workshops.

The Galaxy India community is about enabling data intensive research and instruction in India using the Galaxy platform. As a group, we sponsor:

  • Training and workshops, both standalone and at larger meetings
  • Webinars and community calls
  • In person gatherings, once these become prudent
  • Communications channels, including chat and a mailing list
  • An India-focused server hosted by the European Galaxy Team
